title: Cavetown’s Heartfelt Bedroom Pop Brings Kindness to a Cruel World
description: The 23-year-old British singer-songwriter Robin Skinner has a listenership devoted to his sensitive (but not despairing) music.
dc:creator: Eric Ducker
media:credit: Guy Bolongaro for The New York Times
media:description: “The function of music for me is therapeutic,” Skinner said. “Most of my songs come from something sad because it’s my way of making it into something better, or something that I can control when it’s a feeling that I’m finding confusing.”
